:notoc:

.. porise documentation master file, created by

.. module:: porise

********************
porise documentation
********************

**Date**: |today| **Version**: |version|

:mod:`PORISE` stands for `Personalized Online RecommendatIon System Engine`.
Porise is a python framework for building and evaluating personalized 
recommender systems that needs to train and serve a model online.

.. raw:: html

    <div class="container">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 d-flex">

                    <h5 class="card-title">Getting started</h5>
                    <p class="card-text">New to <em>porise</em>? Check out the getting started guides. They
                    contain an introduction to <em>porise'</em> main concepts.</p>

                    <h5 class="card-title">API reference</h5>
                    <p class="card-text">The reference guide contains a detailed description of
                    the porise API. The reference describes how the methods work and which parameters can
                    be used. It assumes that you have an understanding of the key concepts.</p>
